web_snippets: Julie Irigaray is a French Basque poet who teaches creative writing. Her début poetry pamphlet Whalers, Witches and Gauchos was published by Nine Pens in 2021.
Julie Irigaray · Welcome to my website. · ​ · I am a creative writing tutor and I earned a PhD in English Literature from The University of Huddersfield. · ​.
